name: Review 4
instruction: Guess the secret word by clicking the letters.
instruction_vi: Chọn những chữ cái phù hợp để tìm ra từ bí mật.

answers.hint: to feel painful; to cause pain in a part of your body
a thin red paper cover in which you put lucky money
to move something to a higher position
happy and interested because something good has happened or will happen
to tell somebody about something in a way that makes it easy to understand
If a radio or TV program is live, you see or hear it at the same time as it happens.
a thing that happens, especially something important
staying in a tent on holiday
the part of your leg where it joins your foot
a public festival at which people play music, wear special clothes, and dance in the streets
